TERRESTRIAL SNOW MASS MISSION (TSMM) - PHASE 0 UPDATE
================================================================
# Tender Information

* Sponsored by: [Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)](#public-services-and-procurement-canada-pspc)
* For the: [Canadian Space Agency (CSA)](#canadian-space-agency-csa)
* Tender Reference Number: #WS4585639701
* Amendment Number: #2
* Publication Date: May 17, 2024
* Tender Closing Date and Time: June 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* Amendment Date: June 12, 2024

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: #WS4585639701
* Tender Status: Expired
* UNSPSC Code: *81102302*
* UNSPSC Description: *Space Engineering Service*
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Technical Merit within a Stipulated Maximum Budget

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency, is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide conceptual design, development plans, and cost estimates for the Terrestrial Snow Mass Mission (TSMM) Phase 0 update.

**Objective**

The objective of this tender is to identify a suitable contractor to provide a comprehensive design, development, and cost estimation for the TSMM Phase 0 update.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes:

* Conceptual design and development plans for the TSMM Phase 0 update
* Cost estimates for the future implementation and operation of the TSMM

## Contractual Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entities: Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* End User Entities Address: 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada
